entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
